name: Shadow Drive
effects: Three single attacks (0.90 each), damages the user for 100% max HP, grants [Quick Cast 1] to the user
effectsNote:
The multiplier for this attack is given by the following formula, where X is the current %HP of the user:

min(exp(-1 * (X - 1) * 600 / 10000) * 300 + 400, 700)

The minimum multiplier is 4.00, and never goes higher than 7.00.
